flawed_nl_solution:
He bought 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 pounds of pork
So he has 20+10=<<20+10=30>>30 pounds of meat
That means he can make 30/1.5=<<30/1.5=20>>20 meals
So he makes 20*20=$<<20*20=40>>40
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 40. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
